name: Grilled Lemon Garlic Salmon
description: A simple and healthy salmon recipe with lemon and garlic for a burst of flavor.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with quinoa, black beans, corn, and a tangy lime dressing.

name: Spaghetti Squash Primavera
description: A light and healthy low-carb pasta alternative made with roasted spaghetti squash and vegetables.

name: Sweet Potato Chickpea Buddha Bowl
description: A nourishing bowl packed with roasted sweet potatoes, chickpeas, avocado, and tahini dressing.

name: Greek Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki
description: Grilled chicken marinated with lemon, garlic, and oregano, served with a creamy tzatziki sauce.

name: Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
description: A low-carb alternative to fried rice made with cauliflower rice and loaded with vegetables.

name: Chia Pudding with Mixed Berries
description: A simple and nutritious breakfast or snack made with chia seeds, almond milk, and fresh berries.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
description: A healthy and light zucchini noodle dish with homemade pesto for a fresh flavor.

name: Turkey and Avocado Lettuce Wraps
description: A low-calorie, high-protein snack made with turkey and creamy avocado wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves.

name: Vegetable Lentil Soup
description: A hearty and fiber-rich soup made with lentils, carrots, celery, and a variety of spices.
